author: BrickTVReviews
title: Bad, just nice for collecting
review:
I got this set for around $5.99. The only reason I got this was that I was collecting polybags.

Pros

  • Good minifigure
  • Good design

Cons

  • Not much playability
  • Not worth it for the price I paid.

Not good. Buy it only if you're a polybag collector-and if you find it for free.
